content:
/>
III.i.2.D.1.b
.
Notice of Time Limits to Submit Evidence
Specify a time limit of 30 days for the claimant to submit evidence.
Further advise the claimant
if evidence is not submitted within 30 days, VA may decide the claim based on the information and evidence of record, and
they have one year from the date of VA's request to submit evidence or information to substantiate the claim.
title: M21-1, Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D - Evidence Requested From the Claimant
citation: Part III, Subpart i, Chapter 2, Section D
